meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sunny.
meanings.sent1: The sunninesses of the day brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent2: I love the sunninesses of summer days, it makes me feel happy.
meanings.sent3: The picnic was a success thanks to the sunninesses of the weather.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter filled the room with a warm sunninesses.
meanings.sent5: The sunninesses of his personality always brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: The amount of sunlight or brightness in a place.
meanings.sent1: The sunninesses in the garden made the flowers bloom beautifully.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the sunninesses streaming through the window in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the perfect spot to bask in the sunninesses of the room.
meanings.sent4: The sunninesses of the beach reminded her of carefree days.
meanings.sent5: The sunninesses of the painting made it come alive with color.
